thread.title: Shares recoil as China fires back in U.S. trade war

title: Shares recoil as China fires back in U.S. trade war
text:
Shares recoil as China fires back in U.S. trade war Wednesday, April 04, 2018 - 01:53 
Share markets recoiled on Wednesday as a $50 billion retaliation from China in escalating trade tensions with the United States left investors reluctant to take positions in anything but the safest of assets. Kate King reports.
